methods.notes: Players can gain equal experience rates through barbarian fishing between levels 58-70 Fishing.

methods.xp_rate_raw: Up to 118,000 experience an hour with level 99
methods.notes: If they do not have access to crystallise, players can train using barbarian fishing to gain around 63,000 experience an hour, with level 70 Fishing.Start fishing in Menaphos at level 72 Fishing, for up to 85,000 experience an hour, at level 99 Fishing.

methods.xp_rate_raw: Up to 100,000 experience per hour with level 99 Fishing.
methods.notes: Ghostly Sole is slightly lower experience per hour, however it is the longest AFK of any Fishing training method.

methods.xp_rate_raw: Up to 200,000 experience per hour at level 99 Fishing with boosts
Up to 119,000 experience an hour, at level 99 Fishing.
Over 285,000 experience an hour, at level 99 Fishing.
